typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesID as double,
		Amounts as double,
		Quantity as double,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		SalesID as double,
		Amounts as double,
		Quantity as double,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'SampleData',
	fileName: 'currencysales.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'currencysales1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source2
source(output(
		financialActivityId as string,
		mainAccountCategoryKey as string,
		mainAccountKey as string,
		companyKey as string,
		transactionCurrencyKey as string,
		fiscalCalendarPeriodKey as string,
		ledgerDimensionDisplayValue as string,
		transactionCurrencyCode as string,
		accountingCurrencyAmount as string,
		accountingDate as string,
		ledgerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'FinancialActivity.cdm.json/FinancialActivity',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: '_allImports.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'manifests/core/applicationCommon',
	corpusPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/core/applicationCommon/foundationCommon/financialCommon',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> source3
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'account',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: 'account',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source4
source(output(
		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,
		int_rate as string,
		installment as string,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as string,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as string,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source5
source1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
source3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		financialActivityId as string,
		mainAccountCategoryKey as string,
		mainAccountKey as string,
		companyKey as string,
		transactionCurrencyKey as string,
		fiscalCalendarPeriodKey as string,
		ledgerDimensionDisplayValue as string,
		transactionCurrencyCode as string,
		accountingCurrencyAmount as string,
		accountingDate as string,
		ledgerId as string
	),
	entity: 'FinancialActivity.cdm.json/FinancialActivity',
	format: 'cdm',
	entityPath: 'core/applicationCommon/foundationCommon',
	manifestName: '_allImports.cdm.json',
	corpusPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/core/applicationCommon/foundationCommon/financialCommon',
	folderPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/manifests',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	mapColumn(
		financialActivityId,
		mainAccountCategoryKey,
		mainAccountKey,
		companyKey,
		transactionCurrencyKey,
		fiscalCalendarPeriodKey,
		ledgerDimensionDisplayValue,
		transactionCurrencyCode,
		accountingCurrencyAmount,
		accountingDate,
		ledgerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
source5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		financialActivityId as string,
		mainAccountCategoryKey as string,
		mainAccountKey as string,
		companyKey as string,
		transactionCurrencyKey as string,
		fiscalCalendarPeriodKey as string,
		ledgerDimensionDisplayValue as string,
		transactionCurrencyCode as string,
		accountingCurrencyAmount as string,
		accountingDate as string,
		ledgerId as string
	),
	entity: 'FinancialActivity.cdm.json/FinancialActivity',
	format: 'cdm',
	corpusPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/core/applicationCommon/foundationCommon/financialCommon',
	folderPath: 'CDM-master/schemaDocuments/manifests',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	mapColumn(
		financialActivityId = id,
		mainAccountCategoryKey = loan_amnt,
		mainAccountKey = funded_amnt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
